entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Partly cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
